heading: WHAT YOU NEED: Sturdy chair. TIP: As you progress, you may want to add ankle weights. Walking and climbing stairs are easier when you do both the Knee Curl and Leg Straightening exercises. For an added challenge, you can modify the exercise to improve your balance.

steps.1: Stand behind a sturdy chair, holding on for balance. Lift one leg straight back without bending your knee or pointing your toes. Breathe in slowly.
steps.2: Breathe out as you slowly bring your heel up toward your buttocks as far as possible. Bend only from your knee, and keep your hips still. The leg you are standing on should be slightly bent.
steps.4: Breathe in as you slowly lower your foot to the floor.
steps.7: Repeat 10-15 more times with each leg.
